about_the_game:
DLC 3: Martial Arts Tournament includes new Scenario, Character, Subquests, and Building Types content for That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime ISEKAI Chronicles!

Campaign through the Additional Scenario: Martial Arts Tournament.

The party livens with Additional Character, Milim.

Experience events with Additional Subquests: Valentines Day, Blumund Cooking Contest, Prepackaged Curry, Beer.

Sharpen Tempest with Additional Building Types: Edgy Liquor Store, Edgy Tool Shop, Baron Goblin, Edgy Apartment Complex, Edgy Armory.

*DLC 3 may be included in other editions or bundles. Please be mindful of duplicate purchases.
*Main game must be cleared before DLC can be accessed.
*Contents and specifications are subject to change at any time.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains Fantasy Violence, Suggestive Themes and Mild Language with swear words like “Hell”, “Bastard”, “Damn”, “Piss”.
